Ussaya，in Ussayavādikā，訴訟（Vin．IV，224 is a variant of usuyya° “using envious language，quarrelsome”．-- Another ussaya [fr．ud + wri，cp．Sk．ucchrita，P．ussita & ussāpeti] meaning “accumulation” is found in cpd．samussaya only．

ussaya： ussaya（ti）
ဥဿယ（တိ）
«u+si+a（ṇa）．vi，pi，．»
[ဥ+သိ+အ（ဏ）။ ဝိ၊ပိ၊ဓာန်။]

Ussaya，in °vādika Vin．IV，224 is a variant of usuyya° “using envious language，quarrelsome”．-- Another ussaya [fr．ud + śri，cp．Sk．ucchrita，P．ussita & ussāpeti] meaning “accumulation” is found in cpd．samussaya only．（Page 157）
